meaningMnemonic:
A <kanji>renew</kanji> <kanji>clothes</kanji> <kanji>room</kanji> is a <vocabulary>changing room</vocabulary> or a <vocabulary>locker room</vocabulary>.

更衣室 is a room where people change their clothes, commonly found in places like gyms, swimming pools, schools, or workplaces.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
